channel.title: Autoedit if i click my own topic
channel.description:
lately if i click on my own topic. (to read the replies) i am automaticly transferred to editing the first post.
i just click on the topic name.
ps, i checked, it only happens with my new 'Frequency Modulation patches pack1' topic
is this a bug ? (or a feature?)

item.title: Autoedit if i click my own topic
item.dc:creator: @MartijnVerhallen martijn
item.description:
@MartijnVerhallen wrote:

that fixed it

Read full topic
item.source: Autoedit if i click my own topic

item.title: Autoedit if i click my own topic
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

odd, the only thing I can think is you started editing it at some point, and didnt finish...
click on 'cancel' and then 'abandon edit'

(I edit my 'header' posts and reply to my own topics all the time, and don't get any issues)

Read full topic
item.source: Autoedit if i click my own topic
